blockquote.h1: Welcome to Weld RE-4 School District!

div.div: The COVID-19 crisis has affected all of us in ways we would not have anticipated and disrupted our lives for much longer than we could have imagined.
8000. That's how many students we're expecting in our schools in the 2020-2021 school year. This will take our elementary and middle school capacity to 112%.
